Class Utils

java.lang.Object
io.github.weblegacy.tlddoc.Utils
public final class Utils extends Object
Various utils used by TldDoc.
Author:
ste-gr

      Parameters:
      p - the path
      Returns:

    • processFiles

      public static void processFiles(Path path, Predicate<Path> filter, Consumer<Path> process) throws IOException
      Process all filtered files under the given directory, recursively.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to search (recursively).
      filter - call process when filter is true
      process - process filtered files
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error has occurred

    • processDirs

      public static void processDirs(Path path, Consumer<Path> process) throws IOException
      Process all directories under the given directory, recursively.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to search (recursively).
      process - process directory
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error has occurred

    • backtrackPath

      public static InputStream backtrackPath(Path dir, String path) throws IOException
      Start from the dir and backtrack, using the path as a relative path.

      For example:

      • dir: /home/mroth/test/sample/WEB-INF/tags/mytags
      • path: /WEB-INF/tags/mytags/tag1.tag
      • returns: /home/mroth/test/sample/WEB-INF/tags/mytags/tag1.tag
      Parameters:
      dir - the start-directory
      path - the path to backtrack
      Returns:
      resolved path as InputStream or null when not found
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error has occurred
